com.eurosonic.eurosonicut

Interface IEurosonicUTDataGroup


  • public interface IEurosonicUTDataGroup
    Interface to manage data from UT system

      • getEchoStartGateAmpMeasure

        float getEchoStartGateAmpMeasure(short ch)
        Get amplitude measure from EchoStart gate
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        Returns:
        amplitudes %

      • getEchoStartGateTofMeasure

        float getEchoStartGateTofMeasure(short ch)
        Get time of flight measure from EchoStart gate
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        Returns:
        time of flight µs

      • getGatesAmpMeasures

        float[] getGatesAmpMeasures(short ch)
        Get amplitude measure from gates
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        Returns:
        Table of amplitudes %, index from table is the index number of the gate.

      • getGatesTofMeasures

        float[] getGatesTofMeasures(short ch)
        Get time of flight measure from gate
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        Returns:
        Table of times of flight µs, index from table is the index number of the gate.

      • getScanData

        int getScanData(short ch,
              short[] ascan,
              float[] amp,
              float[] tof,
              int[] encoders)
        Get data in scan mode, only use this function in scan mode.
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        ascan - Ascan table, Ascan size depends on sampling frequency and visualization scale
        amp - Table of amplitudes %, index from table is the index number of the gate.
        tof - Table of times of flight µs, index from table is the index number of the gate.
        encoders - Raw encoder values in step
        Returns:
        Number of data acquired. This number depends on sampling frequency and scale visualization. If it returns 0, there are no patterns in the scan buffer

      • getWaveform

        short[] getWaveform(short ch)
        Get Ascan from the channel
        Parameters:
        ch - Channel number of the UT card (unused=0)
        Returns:
        Ascan table, Ascan size depends on sampling frequency and visualization scale. It returns null value if error.

      • setSynchronisationGroup

        void setSynchronisationGroup(boolean isMaster,
                           int group)
        Setup synchronisation group for the UT card, it's only used with multiple card connection
        Parameters:
        isMaster - Setup the UT card as master or slave
        group - Define the group number with the UT card

      • triggerGroup

        void triggerGroup(int group)
        Trig group, it will acquire data from all UT cards in the group, if single card set group=0
        Parameters:
        group - Number of group (if group not configured or single UT card set 0)
        See Also:
        to setup group

      • updateAllPara

        void updateAllPara()
        Update all settings for the UT card.
